english.segment1: When I can't see You I know You're there. When I can't feel You I will not fear. I will trust in You and I will not be afraid. When the battle is close at hand. Though You're with me and help me stand. I will trust in You and I will not be afraid.
english.segment2: I will not be afraid. I will not be afraid. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you
english.segment3: When the darkness is close at hand. And Im running against the wind. I will trust in you and I will not be afraid. When I'm standing upon that shore. All the battles I've gone before. I will trust in you, and I will not be afraid.
english.segment4: 'Cuz I will not be afraid. I will not be afraid. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you
english.segment5: 'Cuz I will not be afraid. I will not be afraid. 'Cuz I will not be afraid. I will not (whoaho) be afraid. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you. I willl trust in you. I will trust in you. I will trust in you.
